creator: Ivy
descriptionHtml:
💎Block Puzzle - Jewel Crush💎 features the jungle theme and a 10*10 game board, in which you can
immerse yourself with all the benefits designed for you. You will find yourself being
easily hooked on this classic puzzle game thanks to its merit like that releasing stresses
and anxieties👌, and improving concentration and memory. Block Puzzle Jewel, the jigsaw-like
with Tetris spirits puzzle game, helps your brain remain healthy🧠, and your mind calm down.

For your information,Block Puzzle - Jewel Crush can relieve your fatigue and pressure when you play it after work or before getting to bed. If you enjoy some wood block puzzle titles, we definitely assume that you will have a relaxing time with Block Puzzle - Jewel Crush🌈. Download this retro puzzle game now! The more score you achieve🏆, the more easiness you gain😘, and you can have your mind refreshed.

💡How to play Block Puzzle - Jewel Crush:
✔️Blocks get removed when rows or columns are filled up.
✔️Always leave enough space for big blocks.
✔️Must look out for the upcoming blocks.
✔️The game will end if there is no room for the remaining blocks.
✔️Remove blocks timely and wisely, since more blocks mean danger.

💡The features of Block Puzzle - Jewel Crush:
⭐ Exquisite jewels come in diverse colors and shapes;
⭐ Classic block puzzle game with more fun added to it;
⭐ Suitable for relaxing with its smooth control;
⭐ Bright and colorful jungle scene;
⭐ No time limit, no wifi needed;
⭐ Just a single-player game, easy but addictive;
⭐ The blocks can not be rotated;
⭐ Stunning and smooth graphics;
⭐ The leaderboard is supported;
⭐ A classic and retro puzzle game for all ages;

👉You got some good ideas for improving Block Puzzle - Jewel Crush?💌 And you need some help in the game? ❤️We are all ears!
What are you waiting for? Do not hesitate to download Block Puzzle - Jewel Crush and have a nice time!
descriptionShort: An easy but fun Block Puzzle - Jewel Crush game that is good for your brain!🧠
